description: The goal of the course is to acquire the knowledge, skills, and understandings necessary to develop, implement and assess a K-5 general music program. The course emphasizes current approaches such as those of Orff, Dalcroze and Kodaly as well as intercultural and interdisciplinary learning. Required field experience component. Prerequisite: Education 330. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Tchg Music-Elem Schls
prerequisites: Education 330. Offered annually in the spring semester.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Education 330. Offered annually in the spring semester.

title: Teaching of Music in the Elementary School
